p: Before you learn how to program, you should become familiar with Reeborg's world and its surroundings.
This text appears in the Contents window; you can resize it, move it, minimize it or close it. If you do close it, you can always reopen it by clicking on the Contents button at the very top.

The panel on the left is the Editor panel, where you will write the programs that Reeborg will execute. It will do so in the second panel, known as the World panel. A third panel, Reeborg's Diary can also be open from a button on the top.
Try opening and closing the various panels or resize them just to get a feel of how you can rearrange the environment.
Once you're satisfied with your exploration, click on the Next button, either at the top or bottom of this window, to go to the next lesson, where you will have Reeborg take its first steps.
